      • doStage

        private int doStage​(AIPlayer.Move move,
                    java.lang.Integer previous,
                    int depth,
                    boolean max)
        Minmax operation. If won just return static value. Makes sure to roll back move before returning.
        Parameters:
        move - The move to check.
        previous - The best result of the previous stage so far.
        depth - The remaining layers to process.
        max - Boolean; true if max stage, false if min.
        Returns:
        The value of the operation.

      • prune

        private boolean prune​(java.lang.Integer current,
                      java.lang.Integer previous,
                      boolean max)
        Returns true if the current branch can be pruned. If value is over 5000000 for max or under -5000000 for min also prune it, as game is won. Rolls back if can be pruned.
        Parameters:
        current - The best result of this stage.
        previous - The best result of the previous stage.
        max - Boolean; true if max stage, false if min.
        Returns:
        Boolean; true if can be pruned.
